Strong Coffee, Strong DayAbout Our Cafe

Founded in 2001 by the Hendricks brothers, our goal has been serving up the natural coffee sourced from famous farmers in various regions of South and Central America. We want to find the best quality, and bringing back to you here in our cafe.
